text.value: Welcome to BeiDream management system Demo

text.value: Form is not valid. Please check and fix errors.

text.value: Tenant name can not be empty

text.value: User {0} is not active and can not log in.

text.value: Tenant name must be at least 2 chars, starts with a letter and continue with letter, number, dash or underscore.

text.value: Can be empty to login as host.

text.value: Your account is waiting to be activated by system admin.

text.value: Please select one of the following tenants.
